settings.title: What products does the Better Bet sell?
How do I register?
settings.answer: You can register yourself by clicking on this Registration Link. Upon subscribing, you can enjoy regular updates about product launches, offers and promotions. You can also access your purchase records, save your address which helps in quicker checkout.

settings.title: Do I have to share my email id and phone number?
settings.answer:
Yes. We maintain these in our records and use them to send you live updates on your order and information about offers and promotions.
We maintain all safeguards to ensure that your details are secure in our system.

settings.title: How Do I Reset My Password?
settings.answer: To reset your password, please click on the “Forgot my Password” option available in the ‘Sign In’ section. A link to set a new password will be mailed to your registered Email ID.

settings.title: What is your return Policy?
settings.answer: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

settings.title: What is your shipping cost?
settings.answer:
Shipping costs are based on the delivery method. To find out how much your order will cost, please add the items you would like to purchase to your cart, and proceed to the checkout page.
We charge Rs. 89 for online payment orders and Rs. 128 for cash on delivery (COD) orders up to Rs. 1499/-. Free Shipping is provided on orders above Rs 1500/- Once at the checkout screen, shipping charges will be displayed.

settings.title: How will I know if my order is confirmed?
settings.answer: You will receive an email and SMS on order confirmation. Please contact us if you have not received it - hello@altfoods.in / +91 78668 00020

settings.title: When will my order be shipped?
settings.answer: Our orders normally get shipped out within 3-4 business days of order placement. Final delivery time will be intimated to you at the time of order confirmation.
